> If all characters in the game were roughly equal, would that make the
> game more interesting or less interesting?  I'd say less interesting.
Well I believe the abilities should be balanced, so that no single character
is outright 'the best' in the majority of situations.
Obviously in the version of gladiator we have certain characters are not
played, mainly because they are underdeveloped (like orcs, orc captains).
Characters should have their own strengths and weaknesses and particular
purposes in the game.
It shouldn't make it less interesting (look at starcraft, well at least pre
1.08, it was well balanced and that enhanced the fun factor) but rather
should make it more interesting, with more diverse parties being used rather
than everyone using a similar mix.

- Deathifier
